132.issue: [W132] Many "common.news" found in [io-package.json](https://github.com/gaudes/ioBroker.slideshow/blob/master/io-package.json). Repository builder will truncate at 7 news. Please remove old news.

157.issue: [E157] js-controller 3.0.0 listed as dependency but 4.0.24 is required as minimum, 5.0.19 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/gaudes/ioBroker.slideshow/blob/master/io-package.json).

184.issue: [W184] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/gaudes/ioBroker.slideshow/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "adminUI".

251.issue: [E251] Bluefox was not found in the collaborators on [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.slideshow)!. Please execute in adapter directory: `npm owner add bluefox iobroker.slideshow`

254.issue: [E254] Versions "0.1.0, 0.0.5, 0.0.4, 0.0.3, 0.0.2" listed at common.news at [io-package.json](https://github.com/gaudes/ioBroker.slideshow/blob/master/io-package.json) do not exist at [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.slideshow). Please remove from news section.
